captions.text:
Are you hearing my heart 
Are you seeing my tear

Only one in the world 
Only one
It has to be you for me

Why do you 
run away from me

Why do you get 
far away from me

Please be my side 
Please hold my hand

If you love me 
You make me crazy of you
You make me cry
I feel like I can catch it

Like the wind that passes away
When you catch it

Love is done alone
What’s left is tears

Love so useless 
Love so stupid

Can I hug you 
for the last time

Can I say bye 
for the last time

Please don’t forget the happy 
And loving memories we had

You make me 
crazy of you
You make me cry
I feel like I can catch it

Like the wind that passes away
When you catch it

Love is done alone
What’s left is tears

Love so useless 
Love so stupid

When we meet 
again someday
Let’s not say bye then

Those words that my heart say 
I love you

Those words that my tears say
I’m sorry

Even if I try to collect it 
It just spills away

Love is done alone
What’s left is tears

Love so useless 
Love so stupid
